data.name: Host Infrastructure Dashboard
data.description:
## Title

Describe this dashboard. Add links to other dashboards, monitors, wikis,  and docs to help your teammates. Markdown is supported.

- [This might link to a dashboard](#)
- [This might link to a wiki](#)

promqlQuery.value: avg(system_disk_used{(device="c: OR device:/dev/sda1 OR device:/dev/sda2) AND $servicename AND $environment AND $host AND $region AND $team AND $mode AND $technology"}) by (host,device)
